mapper.sql: t.id, t.order_no, t.user_id, t.pay_price, t.pay_time, t.consign_time, t.receipt_time, t.shipping_name, t.shipping_code, t.trade_status, t.sent_status, t.close_time, t.add_time, t.update_time
mapper.delete: delete from goods_order where 1=1 and id=#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into goods_order ( order_no, user_id, pay_price, pay_time, consign_time, receipt_time, shipping_name, shipping_code, trade_status, sent_status, close_time, add_time, update_time ) values( #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{consignTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{receiptTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{shippingName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shippingCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tradeStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{sentStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{closeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
